ticket.title: rake package is broken
ticket.original-body:
Rails source can be cloned but it's rake task "package" is broken. Tested on Mac OS X 10.5.2.
@@@ rake package --trace (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails) ** Invoke package (first_time) ** Execute package (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/activesupport) (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/actionpack) (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/actionmailer) (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/activeresource) (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/activerecord) (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/railties) rake aborted! private method `cp' called for File:Class /tmp/rails/railties/rakefile:258 @@@

Rails source can be cloned but it's rake task "package" is broken. Tested on Mac OS X 10.5.2.
@@@ rake package --trace (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails) ** Invoke package (first_time) ** Execute package (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/activesupport) (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/actionpack) (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/actionmailer) (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/activeresource) (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/activerecord) (in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/railties) rake aborted! private method `cp' called for File:Class /tmp/rails/railties/rakefile:258 @@@
ticket.original-body-html:
Rails source can be cloned but it's rake task "package" is broken. Tested on Mac OS X 10.5.2. 

rake package --trace
(in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails)

** Execute package
(in /Users/zbiru/Documents/GITS/merb-scripts/rails/activesupport)

version.body: Added patch. It was simple syntax error.

version.title: [PATCH] rake package is broken

version.body: In Lighthouse, I think the preference is to use the "patch" tag and leave the title unchanged.
